body: Hi all, I have run the glare analysis but came across a problem with presenting results. I set 3 different views for the glare analysis but with the same view for all the results. Where am I going wrong? I have attached .gh file. Thanks in advance!!! topic: Problem to set different views for Glare Analysis results
